function.name: coolingTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function sets the cooling temperature of a device through voice commands. The utterance must explicitly include the expression 'cooling temperature'.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the cooling temperature for.

coolingTemperature.description: The specific value to set the cooling temperature to.

predefinedCoolingTemperatureUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the cooling temperature (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
